Welcome to pqreader’s documentation!¶

Created on Mon Sep 9 17:08:31 2019

@author: Martin Fränzl

pqreader.correct_overflow(timetags, valid, overflow)[source]¶

Correct timetags for overflow.

pqreader.process_t3records(t3records)[source]¶

Decode t3records from .T3R files.

pqreader.t3r_reader(filename)[source]¶

Load raw T3 records and metadata from a T3R file.

Arguments:
filename (string): the path of the .t3r file to be read.
Returns:
A tuple of timestamps, detectors, nanotimes (integer arrays) and a dictionary with metadata containing at least the keys ‘timestamps_unit’ and ‘nanotimes_unit’.
pqreader.thd_reader(filename)[source]¶

Load data from a PicoQuant .thd file.
